scripts.dev:local: FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8080 PUBSUB_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:8085 FEATURE_DEBUG_MANUAL_TIMESTAMPS=enabled DEBUG_GUILIBLE_MODE=enabled ts-node src/server.ts
scripts.prepare: copyfiles ../common/.env dist/common && copyfiles app.yaml dist && copyfiles openapi.yaml dist && copyfiles package.json dist && node ../../__devops/package-cleaner.js reservation start
scripts.add_web_assets: copyfiles ./views/* dist && copyfiles ./views/layouts/* dist && copyfiles ./src/static/js/* dist/reservation/ && copyfiles ./src/templates/* dist/reservation/
